edit target content:
Forward propagation
 ℎ 1 =tanh 𝑎 ℎ 0 +𝑏 𝑥 1 +𝑐 
 ℎ 2 =tanh 𝑎 ℎ 1 +𝑏 𝑥 2 +𝑐 
 ℎ 3 = tanh  𝑎 ℎ 2 +𝑏 𝑥 3 +𝑐   
 𝑦 3 =𝑑 ℎ 3 +𝑒                        

Backpropagation
Let 𝑓= 𝑦 3  
 𝑑𝑓 𝑑 ℎ 1  ≤ 𝑑 ℎ 2 𝑑 ℎ 1  ×𝑎× 1 2 ×𝑑
  max 𝑥    𝑑 𝑑𝑥  tanh  𝑥    = 1 2  ⇒   𝑑 ℎ 3  𝑑 ℎ 2   ≤𝑎× 1 2
content after edit:
Forward propagation
 h1 = tanh(a h0 + b x1 + c)
 h2 = tanh(a h1 + b x2 + c)
 h3 = tanh(a h2 + b x3 + c)
 y3 = d h3 + e

Backpropagation
Let f = y3
 df/dh1 ≤ (dh2/dh1) × a × 1/2 × d
 max_x d/dx tanh(x) = 1/2  ⇒  dh3/dh2 ≤ a × 1/2

content after edit:
Forward propagation
 h1 = tanh(a h0 + b x1 + c)
 h2 = tanh(a h1 + b x2 + c)
 h3 = tanh(a h2 + b x3 + c)
 y3 = d h3 + e

Backpropagation
Let f = y3
 df/dh1 ≤ (dh2/dh1) × a × 1/2 × d
 max_x d/dx tanh(x) = 1/2  ⇒  dh3/dh2 ≤ a × 1/2
